Html:
Dear All,

I have built a simple exe appliocation that uses the Touchless Lib and WebCam lib, the application runs perfectly 
under vs 2008 but if i try to execute the .exe file the application does even start i simply 
the Appname as stopped working ..search for solution dialog box.


So, i downloaded the latest build from Codplex and if i run the demo app in debug and then press the drop down for the demo crashes
with 

"Could not load file or assembly 'WebCamLib, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null' or one of its dependencies. An attempt was made to load a program with an incorrect format."

=== Pre-bind state information ===
LOG: User = Real-PC\Ladva
LOG: DisplayName = WebCamLib, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null
 (Fully-specified)
LOG: Appbase = file:///C:/_downloads/touchless-55790/trunk/Touchless/Touchless.Demo/bin/Debug/
LOG: Initial PrivatePath = NULL
Calling assembly : Touchless.Vision, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null.
===
LOG: This bind starts in default load context.
LOG: No application configuration file found.
LOG: Using machine configuration file from C:\Windows\Microsoft.NET\Framework64\v2.0.50727\config\machine.config.
LOG: Policy not being applied to reference at this time (private, custom, partial, or location-based assembly bind).
LOG: Attempting download of new URL file:///C:/_downloads/touchless-55790/trunk/Touchless/Touchless.Demo/bin/Debug/WebCamLib.DLL.
ERR: Failed to complete setup of assembly (hr = 0x8007000b). Probing terminated.


I've done a clean and rebuild of the entire solution but to no avail.

Pls help.

Thnx
even i got this error.. please help

hi guys i know it's a bit late, but could be useful for others.

make sure you have referenced the two libraries correctly.

and then, try the following : either:

1- replace the existing dll with the new one, or

2- set the correct startup file in the project explorer.

hope this works.

hi guys,

 

change platform target to "x86" instead of "any cpu" on the BUILD tab of your project.

it will not work to "any cpu" and x64" platform.
how will I be able to run this on 64 bit cpu? is it possible?
